bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Camilo Chavez, April 15, 1948

div1.p: Hench thanks Chavez for the photographs and requests permission to use them in slides and in his book, crediting them to Chavez.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Camilo Chavez, April 15, 1948
div1.opener:
April 15, 1948
Colonel Camilo Chavez
Cuban Army Air Force
Ciudad Militar
Marianao, Cuba
My dear Colonel Chavez:
div1.p:
I was delighted indeed to receive through
Mr. Moran of Havana, the fine new air photographs
which you took for me. I cannot tell you how much
I appreciate these. I have really gone to a great
deal of trouble trying to locate such air views with-
out success and it would have been impossible without
your help for me to get them.

I want to have lantern slides made to use
with my lectures and also want to publish them in
my book. It would give me great pleasure to in-
dicate that I received the photos through your
courtesy.
div1.closer: Very sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:alc
